Barb's conspiracy theory 1,098---- You all purposely held back with  the 
reviews and warnings of how horrid it is until _after_ I foolishly 
sought this thing out and ordered it... :-D

Oh well after paying $20 something to take my girls to see that travesty 
they called the Village a few months back I can deal.
